titleStmt.title: SII 13.35: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 35. (A.R. No. 169 of 1907.) TIRUPPALĀTTUṞAI, TRICHINOPOLY TALUK, TRICHINOPOLY DISTRICT. ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE, ĀDIMŪLĒŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This records an endowment of lands made after purchase by a certain Kūttappirāṉ-Bhaṭṭaṉ of Ādaṉūr for the requirements of worship and offerings in the temple, which are specified in detail. The alphabet of this record is similar to that of No. 170 of 1907 of Vikrama-Chōḷa, and the style of wording is also comparatively late, and hence this may be ascribed to the reign of Kulōttuṅga-Chōḷa I.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . korājakecaripanmaṟku yāṇṭu 3Āvatu Ātaṉūr kūttappirāṉbhaṭṭaṉ tirupparāttu kuṉāṉ cantrātittavaṟ vaiytta nibandhaṅkaḷukku bhogamāka vaitta nila
ṉ Uttamacilicaruppetimaṅkalattu korovi śrī nārāyaṇabhaṭṭaṉpakkal kkuṟai kam govintavāykkālukku teṟku kiḻakkuniṉṟum mūṉṟām kaṇṇāṟṟu vaṭakku niṉṟum
caturattu Ivaṉpakkal nāṉ vilaiykku koṇṭu Uṭaiya nilam Orumā Araiykkāṇi muntirikai tevaṉmaṅkalattu kāccuvaṉ cāttaṉ nilaṉpakkal narasiṁhavatiykku kiḻakkum Uttamacili vāykkālukku vaṭakku
m meṟkkuniṉṟum mūṉṟām kaṇṇāṟṟu teṟkuniṉṟum mutaṟ caturattu tattaṉ viṣṇubhaṭṭaṉ Uḷḷiṭṭa catukkattārkku paṭṭa mūṉṟām pāṭakam mākāṇiyil vaṭakiḻakkaṭaiya ṉāṉ Ivaṉpakkal koṇṭa nilam Orumāvum Ipāṭakattey
Iṉṉilattoṭumaṭaiya tirumaṅkalattuk kālāvaṉ bhaṭṭaṉ koṟa Iṭai nāṉ vilaikku koṇṭa nilam kāṇiyum Āka nilam mākāṇiyum puḷḷamaṅkalattu mātaṉ ciriyaṉ tāyaṉ tiruvaraṅkanārāyaṇaṉ rājakecariy
vatiykku kiḻakkum Uttamacilivāykkālukku teṟkum meṟkuniṉṟum I m kaṇṇāṟṟu vaṭakkuniṉṟum mutaṟcaturattu vaṭakkaṭaiya Oṭappuṟai śrīdharabhaṭṭaṉ Uḷiṭṭa catukkattārkkup paṭṭa pattām pāṭakam Oru kkaṭaiyar Iva
ṉpakkal nāṉ vilaikku koṇṭa nilam kāṇiyum Āka nilam Irumāvarai Araikkāṇiy muntiriy kaiyāl paṭiy nellu 2 100 8 10 5 nūṟṟeṇpatu Aiyañ kalat llakkaṭava nibandham Uccampotu Amutu ceyya vaitta pāṟ
p poṉakattukku cellakkaṭavapaṭiy tiruAmutukku patteṭṭukkuttal paḻavarici nāṉāḻiyum mālai Amutu nāṉāḻiyum caṟkkarai Amutu nāṟppalamum poṉakattu ṭaikka ney Uḻakkum porikkaṟiyamutu porikka ney Oru piṭi
yum nāḻi Uriy nelliṉ porikkaṟi Amutum Aṭaikkāy Amutu Aiyntum veṟṟilai Amutu patiṉ Aintum mpamutu muḻākkum nittaṟppaṭi putumaṭāvum puttolomiyum Iṭum kucavaṉukku nellu Iru nāḻiyum Āka Ippaṭi cantrā
tittavaṟ celvatukku bhogam Āvatākavum kiraṉūr Āttiraiyaṉ parameśvaraṉ tāyaṉ pakkal śrīvira śrīkāmukavatikku meṟku Uttamaciliyvāykkālukku vaṭakku kiḻakkuniṉṟum Iraṇṭām kaṇṇāṟṟu teṟkuniṉṟum Iraṇṭām caturattu perumaru
tūr nārāyaṇaṉ cen=taṉ Uḷḷiṭṭa catukkattukkup pattām pāṭakam Oru māvil vaṭakka kaṭaiya nilam ṉpakkal vilaiykku koṇṭa nilam Araimāvum Ippāṭakattey kāṟṟiṟaiya nārāyaṇakkiramavittaṉ pakkal nāṉ vilaiykku koṇṭuUṭaiya
nilam Araimāvum Āka nilam Orumā Itil Araimācceyyāl neyyātal Eḷ Eṇṇaiyyātal Aṭṭiy Oru non=tāviḷakku candrātittavaṟ Erippatākavum niṟai Araiymāc ceyyālum citāriyttiruppukaiykku Akil Oru kūṟum ne
riyyāsam Oru kūṟum Akilil Upattiram cakuṇam śrīkaṇṭamum karppūram bhimaseni tu Āṭṭaiyaviṭṭam Eḻu kaḻañcu Iṭṭu Itukku veṇṭum teṉ Aṭṭiy kūṭṭiya nittaṟpaṭi Ivvūr Āṭu paḻaṅkallāl nittalpaṭiy nāṟ
nāṟ kaḻañcu citāri Ipparicu Icci kkum tiru Oru māvum bhogam Āvatākavum peruveṅkūrk kāccuvaṉ na
ṉ kāriy brāhmaṇi pakkal viraśrīkāmukavatikku meṟkkum ṟukku vaṭakkum kiḻakku niṉṟum muṉṟām kaṇṇāṟṟu te
m mutaṟccaturattu peruṅkāvil kavarkāci tā kaṉ kkuppaṭṭa pattām pāṭakam mukkāṇi yi
kkaṭaiya nāṉku yakku koṇṭa nilam kāṇi kaṭava nibandham Ikkāṇiy Araiykkāṇiyu
Iruvar tavaciyar muṟṟu nāḷ Uccampotu vaiytta nicatam nāḻi dha ttu maṭaiyat tiruppaḷḷittāma
taṭṭiya śrī tirumuṟṟamum tirumaṇṭapamum Ellām paḻa ku Iṭam tirumeḻukku Iṭak kaṭavārkaḷ Ākavum Iṉnila
ṉ nilam bhogam yum Āka Ipparicu Ivakaḷaṉaiyttu niban ṉa nilam 1/5 1/320 nāṉkumā muntiriykaiyum Utakapū
paṭayak kuṭutteṉ Ātaṉūr kūttappirān bhaṭṭa Ivar paṇi Eḻutiṉen vaṭakaraiyt tirukkaḻumalanāṭṭu Enāti
ṉ nāraṇan nāna Aiyyāṟaneṉ Ivaiy En Eḻuttu Ippaṭiy Iṉnila ten Ātaṉurk kūttappirān bhaṭṭaneṉ Ippaṭi Aṟi
yāṟṟukkuṭiy cāvāntiy pūvattaṉ nilakaṇṭaṉeṉ Ippaṭi Aṟi pālāciriyaṉ puruṣottamaṉ tevaṉeṉ .
ykuṭi mokiliyaṉ bhaṭṭaṉ cuvaraṉ kovaneṉ .. Ippaṭiy Aṟiyveṉ koṭṭaiyyūr Ūr kiḻār makaṉ ṇṭaṉ nārāyaṇaṉeṉ Ippaṭiy
yarur nārāyaṇaṉ jaṉārddanaṉeṉ Ippaṭiy Aṟiyveṉ periyavāṉavaṉ māteviy Irāyūrt tiruvaraṅkabhaṭṭaṉeṉ .. Ātaṉūrk kūttappi
ṟey parameśvararkku nāṉ vaiytta pāṟppoṉakam Amutuceyya nāṉ Iṭṭa cepputtaḷiykey 1Oṉṟum tiruveḷḷaṟaiykkolāl 10m cey
niṟaiya vaiytta citāriykku Iṭṭa tūpaakal tirā vināl 1 niṟai � yam tūpamaṇi 1 Itu panmāheśvararakṣai ..
